title: Pensions Act 2010 (No. 37 of 2010)) in Table 2 to Schedule 3 to, the Social
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 4) (Income Disregard) 
Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2023 shall be construed together as 
one and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Supplementary Welfare Allowance) Regulations 2007 to 2023. 

Definition 

“The Regulations of 2022” means the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 10) (Income Disregard) Regulations 
2022 (S.I. No. 397 of 2022). 

Assessment of means

title: Pensions Act 2010 (No. 37 of 2010)) in Table 2 to Schedule 3 to, the Social
heading: 2. (1) The Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control)
text_raw:
2. (1) The Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control) 

Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 142 of 2007) are amended- 

(a) 

(b) 

in paragraph (i) of article 8(3), (inserted by article 3(b) of the 
Regulations of 2022), by the insertion after “Subject to” of “the 
cessation of this disregard on 17 March 2025, and”, 

in paragraph (i) of article 155, (inserted by article 3(c) of the 
Regulations of 2022), by the insertion after “Subject to” of “the 
cessation of this disregard on 17 March 2025, and”, 

and 

(c) 

in paragraph (o) of article 174, (inserted by article 3(d) of the 
Regulations of 2022), by the insertion after “Subject to” of “the 
cessation of this disregard on 17 March 2025, and”. 

(2) Article 3(2) of the Regulations of 2022 are hereby revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[160] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 March, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, 
National Development Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 March, 2023. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection.

title: Pensions Act 2010 (No. 37 of 2010)) in Table 2 to Schedule 3 to, the Social
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Social Welfare 
(Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control) 
(Amendment) (No. 10) (Income Disregard) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 397 of 
2022) provide that income received (up to a maximum of €269.23 weekly 
which equates to €14,000 per annum) by a person from renting out a room in 
their home to a person who is not an employee or an immediate family member 
will be disregarded in the assessment of means for the purposes of weekly 
social assistance payments, increases for qualified adults and the Working 
Family Payment. 

Article 3(2) of those Regulations provides for a cessation of that disregard with 
effect from 17 March 2023. 

These Regulations extend the duration of the disregard until 17 March 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [160] 5
